page.title: 14CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: There are 53 clubs and societies in Youlgrave. There are five groups associated with the church and one of them is the Sunday School. At the playing fields you can join clubs like the cricket, bowls, tennis and football clubs. At the Village Hall you can play badminton, dance and join the youth club. Children can join the cubs, brownies, guides and scouts. The village has a thriving Women's Institute which meets monthly at the Village Hall. A pantomime is held every year which coach loads of people from miles around come to see. The village has its own silver band and a pigeon club. At the Knoll Club members of the British Legion meet regularly. The village has "Meals on Wheels" where volunteers deliver meals to old people. Nicholas Margree (11)
